author: Keegan Hamilton, Courtney Brooks
title: Second Inmate Dies From COVID-19 at Louisiana Prison as Entire Federal System Goes on Lockdown
description: “At this point, my concern is that COVID-19 is becoming a death sentence at Oakdale FCI,” said one attorney with a client in the prison.
content: A second inmate died Wednesday from COVID-19 at a federal prison in Louisiana that is being overwhelmed by a coronavirus outbreak, prompting concerns that the crisis is spiraling out of control even as officials take more extreme measures to curb the spread o… [+4525 chars]
